name: Bah Humbug at the Toy Store

masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Some jackass in a 'Bah Humbug' sweater just released a swarm of robotic locusts into the toy store! He's screaming about 'ending the commercialization of Christmas' while everything burns! Kids are crying! Parents are panicking! Someone stop this Grinch wannabe!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop the anti-Christmas villain
  • Disable the robotic locust swarm
  • Save the remaining toysâ€”and the kids' Christmas spirit
